course.title: CSI 4142 Fundamentals of Data Science (3 units)
course.desc: Big data, analytics, and cloud computing; data preparation: organization, basic statistics, cleaning, and integration; data mining techniques: pattern mining, classification, clustering, outlier and anomaly detection; model evaluation; data warehousing and multi-dimensional analysis; data visualization and visual data analytics.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: CSI 2132, (CSI 3120 or SEG 2106), MAT 2377 or (MAT 2371 and MAT 2375).
